class test.Pets(name, owner)¶

Bases: object

This class will represent a class for pets

add_pet(name)¶

adds a pet to the pet list

Parameters

name (string) – pet name to add to the list

static get_average_age(pet_type)¶

prints out the average age of a pet

Parameters

pet_type (string) – 3 most popular pets

classmethod random_pets(owner)¶

special method was created after to address owners that did not want to pick a pet name.

Parameters

  • cls (Pets) – an instance of the class passed to __init__

  • owner (string) – the owner of this pet

show_pets()¶

prints out all the pets in the list
